canonical_text:
Title: DAO-001: Core Governance Update

This proposal updates specific DAO parameters to improve security and efficiency while keeping all other governance rules unchanged.
​
If passed, the DAO will execute the required on‑chain transactions to apply these parameter changes exactly as specified in the associated execution payload.
